Name: Figure of Ptah-Sokar-Osiris
Description: Wooden figure representing the god Ptah-Sokar-Osiris leaning against a back pillar, on a rectangular foot underneath of which is a peg for insertion. The figure is rather damaged, although there are some remnants of painting on stucco, in red, blue and black, on the head, the feet and in the area of the back pillar. The feathers and the rectangular base on which the figure once rested are missing.
